text: Matej Grešák (born 31 May 1999) is a Slovak football midfielder who currently plays for Poprad. ==Club career== ===1. FC Tatran Prešov=== Grešák made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for Tatran PrešovPODBREZOVÁ VS. TATRAN PREŠOV 1 - 1 10.12.2016, soccerway.com against ŽP Šport Podbrezová on 10 December 2016. ==References== ==External links== * Fortuna Liga profile * * Futbalnet profile Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:1.
